What We Do

We provide sustainable solutions for animal fat and plant-based oil byproducts, diverting them from potential waste outlets, and transforming them into valued inputs for essential industries around the world

With operating facilities in Houston, Texas and Dakota City, Nebraska, we have the storage and processing capabilities to meet exacting product specifications for our customers. Our operating footprint and logistics solutions enable us to service US and global customers via rail, truck, or vessel.

Pretreatment

Our processing facilities offer pretreatment capabilities to meet customer specifications.

Supply Chain Solutions

Our highly developed supply chain infrastructure provides the scale and flexibility needed to reliably service our global customers. Our storage capacity and logistics capabilities enable us to mitigate supply chain disruptions and access global markets via road, rail and sea.

Trusted Partnerships

Our reputation is built on unwavering integrity, and our ability to consistently deliver for our customers with technical expertise, operational flexibility and scale, and product quality.
